Author:
Flavio Esposito implementation of the node bidding class that every ph.node performs

Specified by:
overbidAttempt in interface BiddingAPI
Parameters:
sliceRequested -
Returns:
true if it is possible to overbid, i.e. if exists j : h_{ij} = I(U_ij (t) > b_ij (t)) != 0

check if bidding is needed, because there is enough capacity or because the auction policy allows another bidding, and eventually orders bidding phase termination
